revised_title: Fossil Reptilia: Pareiasaurus and Related Species
tldr: The author examines the structure, organization, and classification of fossil reptiles, specifically focusing on Pareiasaurus and related species. They analyze various skeletal features and compare them to other reptiles, such as Labyrinthodonts, Anomodonts, and Procolophon. The author concludes that Pareiasaurus belongs to the Pareiasauria group and discusses the relationships between Anomodontia and other vertebrates.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Vertebrate Paleontology
